A deposit paid by the proxied account th: A deposit paid by the proxied account that can not be used while the proxy is in existence. The deposit is returned when the proxy is destroyed. The amount reserved is based on the base deposit and number of proxies
Accounts injected from any of these exte: Accounts injected from any of these extensions will appear in this application and be available for use. The above list is updated as more extensions with external signing capability become available.
An encrypted backup file will be created: An encrypted backup file will be created once you have pressed the ’Download’ button. This can be used to re-import your account on any other machine.
Any account set as proxy will be able to: Any account set as proxy will be able to perform actions in place of the proxied account
Any democracy vote performed by the dele: Any democracy vote performed by the delegated account will result in an additional vote from the delegating account
Consider storing your account in a signe: Consider storing your account in a signer such as a browser extension, hardware device, QR-capable phone wallet (non-connected) or desktop application for optimal account security.
Derivation for Ledger-type accounts are: Derivation for Ledger-type accounts are only available on mnemonic seeds.
Ensure that the extension has accounts,: Ensure that the extension has accounts, some accounts are visible globally and available for this chain and that you gave the application permission to access accounts from the extension to use them.
Ensure that you utilized the ’Save’ func: Ensure that you utilized the ’Save’ functionality before using a generated address to receive funds. Without saving the address and the associated seed any funds sent to it will be lost.
For approvals outstanding approvers will: For approvals outstanding approvers will be shown, for hashes that should be cancelled the first approver is required.
Future versions of the web-only interfac: Future versions of the web-only interface will drop support for non-external accounts, much like the IPFS version.
Get help and badges from classmates: Get help and badges from classmates
I have saved my mnemonic seed safely: I have saved my mnemonic seed safely
If the delegated account is currently vo: If the delegated account is currently voting in a referendum, the delegating vote and conviction will be added.
If you add several proxy accounts for th: If you add several proxy accounts for the same proxy type (e.g 2 accounts set as proxy for Governance), then any of those 2 accounts will be able to perform governance actions on behalf of the proxied account
It is recommended that you create/store: It is recommended that you create/store your accounts securely and externally from the app. On {{yourBrowser}} the following browser extensions are available for use -
Multisig message with call (for final ap: Multisig message with call (for final approval)
One or more extensions are detected in y: One or more extensions are detected in your browser, however no accounts has been injected.
Password are ignored for hex seed: Password are ignored for hex seed
Please make sure to save this file in a: Please make sure to save this file in a secure location as it is required, together with your password, to restore your account.
Press the link to send Slon: Press the link to send Slon
Provide the account QR from the module/e: Provide the account QR from the module/external application for scanning. Once detected as valid, you will be taken to the next step to add the account to your list.
Save this backup file in a secure locati: Save this backup file in a secure location. Additionally, the password associated with this account is needed together with this backup file in order to restore your account.
Since some extensions, such as the polka: Since some extensions, such as the polkadot-js extension, protects you against all community reported phishing sites, there are valid reasons to use them for additional protection, even if you are not storing accounts in it.
Since the multisig function like any oth: Since the multisig function like any other account, once created it is available for selection anywhere accounts are used and needs to be funded before use.
Soft derivation paths are not allowed on: Soft derivation paths are not allowed on ed25519
Supply a JSON file with the list of sign: Supply a JSON file with the list of signatories.
Swap to a non-executing approval type, w: Swap to a non-executing approval type, with subsequent calls providing the actual call data.
The account type that you wish to create: The account type that you wish to create. This is the top-level derivation.
The address index on the account that yo: The address index on the account that you wish to add. This is the second-level derivation.
The address that has previously setup a: The address that has previously setup a proxy to one of the accounts that you control.
The amount to allocate and the convictio: The amount to allocate and the conviction that will be applied to all votes made on a referendum.
The call data for this transaction match: The call data for this transaction matching the hash. Once sent, the multisig will be executed against this.
The call hash from the list of available: The call hash from the list of available and unapproved calls.
The creator for this multisig call: The creator for this multisig call
The current approvals applied to this mu: The current approvals applied to this multisig
The derivation path allows you to create: The derivation path allows you to create different accounts from the same base mnemonic.
The derivation path is only relevant whe: The derivation path is only relevant when deriving keys from a mnemonic.
The derivation will be constructed from: The derivation will be constructed from the values you specify.
The existing account password as specifi: The existing account password as specified when this account was created or when it was last changed.
The genesisHash for the scanned account: The genesisHash for the scanned account does not match the genesisHash of the connected chain. The account will not be usable on this chain.
The helpers should be able to verify, vi: The helpers should be able to verify, via an off-chain mechanism, that the account owner indeed wishes to recover access and as such provide any approvals. In the cases of malicious recovery procedures, they will have the power to stop it.
The local name for this account. Changin: The local name for this account. Changing this does not affect your on-line identity, so this is only used to indicate the name of the account locally.
The maximum amount you can delegate is t: The maximum amount you can delegate is the amount of funds available on the delegating account.
The name for this account as it will app: The name for this account as it will appear under your accounts.
The name is for unique identification of: The name is for unique identification of the account in your owner lists.
The network from which this account was: The network from which this account was originally generated is different than the network you are currently connected to. Once imported ensure you toggle the ’allow on any network’ option for the account to keep it visible on the current network.
The operation type to apply. For approva: The operation type to apply. For approvals both non-final and final approvals are supported.
The recoverable account is protected aga: The recoverable account is protected against the loss of seed/access by a social process.
The signatories has the ability to creat: The signatories has the ability to create transactions using the multisig and approve transactions sent by others.Once the threshold is reached with approvals, the multisig transaction is enacted on-chain.
The threshold for approval should be les: The threshold for approval should be less or equal to the number of signatories for this multisig.
The threshold for approvals and the dela: The threshold for approvals and the delay is the protection associated with the account. The delay should be such that any colluding recovery attempts does have a window to stop.
These are trusted individuals that can v: These are trusted individuals that can verify and approve any recovery actions. With recovery, once the threshold is reached, the funds associated with the account can be moved to a new destination.
This is a development account derived fr: This is a development account derived from the known development seed. Do not use for any funds on a non-development network.
This is an invalid derivation path.
This update includes chain metadata and: This update includes chain metadata and chain properties.
This will apply to any future use of thi: This will apply to any future use of this account as stored on this browser. Ensure that you securely store this new password and that it is strong and unique to the account.
To get Slon, ask a sender to scan:: To get Slon, ask a sender to scan:
Unable to match provided value to a secr: Unable to match provided value to a secret URI
We will provide you with a generated bac: We will provide you with a generated backup file after your account is created. As long as you have access to your account you can always download this file later by clicking on ’Backup’ button from the Accounts section.
You don’t have any accounts. Some featur: You don’t have any accounts. Some features are currently hidden and will only become available once you have accounts.
You have 1 extension that needs to be up: You have 1 extension that needs to be updated with the latest chain properties in order to display the correct information for the chain you are connected to.
You have {{upgradableCount}} extensions: You have {{upgradableCount}} extensions that need to be updated with the latest chain properties in order to display the correct information for the chain you are connected to.
You should not setup proxies to act as a: You should not setup proxies to act as a self-proxy.
You will remove any delegation made by t: You will remove any delegation made by this acccount
Your password contains at least one ’/’: Your password contains at least one ’/’ character. Disregard this warning if it is intended.
account details rows toggled on icon tog: account details rows toggled on icon toggle click
account rows display the details balance: account rows display the details balance info
account rows display the shorted address: account rows display the shorted address
account rows display the total balance i: account rows display the total balance info
created account is added to list: created account is added to list
gives an error message when entering inv: gives an error message when entering invalid derivation path
name: name
navigates through the modal flow with en: navigates through the modal flow with enter key
sorts accounts by date by default: sorts accounts by date by default
the accounts table contains a message ab: the accounts table contains a message about no accounts available
the accounts table contains no account r: the accounts table contains no account rows
the accounts table contains some account: the accounts table contains some account rows
the all networks badge is displayed: the all networks badge is displayed
the all networks badge is not displayed: the all networks badge is not displayed
the development badge is not displayed: the development badge is not displayed
the regular badge is not displayed: the regular badge is not displayed
when account is not tagged, account row: when account is not tagged, account row details displays none info
when account is tagged, account row deta: when account is tagged, account row details displays tags
